[Skip to main content](https://dragselect.com/docs/intro#__docusaurus_skipToContent_fallback)

On this page

# Getting Started

DragSelect is a small but professional, cross platform library with no dependencies that adds a selection mechanism similar to your operating system to the browser. It allows you to select multiple elements and drag and drop them around.

Let's discover how to use **DragSelect in less than 2 minutes**. You donâ€™t believe me? Itâ€™s very easy, youâ€™ll see!

## ðŸ§© Installation (Install it) [â€‹](https://dragselect.com/docs/intro\#-installation-install-it "Direct link to ðŸ§© Installation (Install it)")

You can download the binary files and add them to your document.
Or better use a Content Delivery Network (CDN).
Or even better install it via a package manager like NPM:

- NPM
- Yarn
- Download
- CDN

```codeBlockLines_AclH
npm i -S dragselect

```

## ðŸŽ¸ That's it, you're ready to rock! (Use it) [â€‹](https://dragselect.com/docs/intro\#-thats-it-youre-ready-to-rock-use-it "Direct link to ðŸŽ¸ That's it, you're ready to rock! (Use it)")

DragSelect supports `module.exports`, `AMD Modules` with `define`, `es6 modules` with `.esm` versions and has a fallback to global namespace for maximum out of the box support:

- ES6
- CommonJS
- AMD
- Global
- From CDN

```codeBlockLines_AclH
import DragSelect from "dragselect";

const ds = new DragSelect({
  selectables: document.querySelectorAll(".selectable"),
});

ds.subscribe("DS:end", (e) => {
  console.log(e);
});

```

## ðŸŽ¬ Aaaand action! (See it) [â€‹](https://dragselect.com/docs/intro\#-aaaand-action-see-it "Direct link to ðŸŽ¬ Aaaand action! (See it)")

## ðŸ“š What next? [â€‹](https://dragselect.com/docs/intro\#-what-next "Direct link to ðŸ“š What next?")

Most importantly:

- If you like what you see, make sure toDragSelect
- Tell all your friends/colleagues.
- If you think it is worth continuing developing & maintaining DragSelect, pleaseor [contribute](https://github.com/ThibaultJanBeyer/DragSelect/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md)!
- If your project makes money: [Purchase a commercial license](https://dragselect.com/licenses).

> Creating and maintaining useful tools is a lot of work. Thank you :-)

### Learn [â€‹](https://dragselect.com/docs/intro\#learn "Direct link to Learn")

This page is just a very brief introduction showcasing a limited set of the many features.
DragSelect is ultra extensible and feature rich!
Make sure to read the guides and the documentation. If youâ€™re stuck feel free to [reach out on Github](https://github.com/ThibaultJanBeyer/DragSelect).

- [API](https://dragselect.com/docs/category/API)
- [Guided Examples](https://dragselect.com/docs/category/guided-examples)
